name: Aloe Vera Drink
description: I drink these normally from a store called Aldi. Three day steep for it to blend together nicely
author: Thadentman

reviews.text: Big surprise of the summer for me, I found this extremely delicious. Cactus can be a polarizing flavor when used high and I can honestly see some people having issues with it. Personally, for me this was the epitome of summer in a bottle. A wonderful bright delicious and refreshing vape. Juicy to the core with no bitterness or off notes.
